results.title: Proteomic and functional annotation analysis of injured peripheral nerves reveals ApoE as a protein upregulated by injury that is modulated by metformin treatment
results.text_hl: We used multidimensional protein identification technology (MUDPIT) on sciatic @<m>DISEASE_Jensen_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537568 @@@nerve@@@ samples taken from @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with sham surgery, spinal @<m>DISEASE_Jensen_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537568 @@@nerve@@@ ligation (SNL) surgery or SNL + 200 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Melemedjian OK, Yassine HN, Shy A, Price TJ. Proteomic and functional annotation analysis of injured peripheral nerves reveals ApoE as a protein upregulated by injury that is modulated by metformin treatment Mol Pain. 2013 Mar 26;9():14. PMID: 23531341
